ABOUT NAVGUJARAT

Affiliated with Gujarat University

NavGujarat BCA College (Sector 28) is a premier institute offering degrees directly awarded by Gujarat University.

We have adopted the new 4-Year NEP Curriculum, allowing students to gain an Honors degree with specialization in AI, Data Science, and Software Development.


#GujaratUniversity #GovernmentRecognized

15+

Years of Legacy

2500+

Alumni Network

4 Years

Honors Program

4-Year Roadmap (NEP)

Complete journey from Basics to Honors.

Year 1: Foundation

  • Programming in C
  • HTML, CSS & Web Basics
  • Basic Mathematics
  • Communication Skills

Year 2: Core

  • Object Oriented Prog (C++)
  • Database (SQL/Oracle)
  • Data Structures (DSA)
  • Software Engineering

Year 3: Advanced

  • Java Programming
  • Python & AI Basics
  • Web Development (PHP)
  • Android App Basics

Year 4: Honors

  • Research Methodology
  • Machine Learning / Cloud
  • 6-Month Internship
  • Honors Degree Project

Common Questions

Where is the college located?
We are located in the heart of Gandhinagar, Gujarat. Easily accessible by public transport.
Is Maths compulsory for BCA admission?
No, students from Commerce, Arts, or Science streams can apply. We teach necessary maths logic in the first semester.
Do you have a hostel?
While we don't have an on-campus hostel, we have tie-ups with several PG and Hostels nearby in Sector 28 and 11.

Admissions Closing Soon!

Applications for the 2024-25 Batch (Gujarat University Affiliated) are filling fast. Visit our Sector 28 Campus today.
